title: Container packing lists and weight certificates (VGM)
dataVerified: Shipper, packer, container number, cargo weight, packing details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: VGM status (verified/accepted). Link to shipper/weighing facility system (carrier and regulators, requires authentication)
rationale: SOLAS Verified Gross Mass (VGM) requirement. Domain binding verifies shipper/weighing facility. Prevents misdeclared cargo weight (vessel stability safety). International maritime law compliance. Carrier verification.
